ARABIC: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْحَقُّ وَأَنَّ مَا يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِ ٱلْبَٰطِلُ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْعَلِىُّ ٱلْكَبِيرُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That is because Allah - He is the Truth, and what you call upon besides Him is falsehood. Allah is the All- High, the Most Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That is so for God is the Reality, and what they invoke other than Him is illusion. Indeed God is all-high and supreme.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: All this is because Allah, He alone, is the Truth and all that which they call upon beside Him is false. Surely Allah, He alone, is All-High, Incomparably Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is because God is the supreme Truth and whatever they worship besides Him is falsehood. God is the Most High and the Most Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is because only Allah is the Truth, and all that they worship besides Him are falsehood, and because only Allah is the Supreme, the Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: That is because Allah, He is the Truth, and that which they invoke besides Him is falsehood; and that Allah, He is the Most High, the Most Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: This is because Allah is the Truth, and that which they call upon besides Him is the falsehood, and that Allah is the High, the Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: That is because God -- He is the Truth, and that they call upon apart from Him -- that is the false; and for that God is the All-high, the All-great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: That (is so) because Allah, He is the True, and that which they invoke beside Him is the False, and because Allah, He is the Sublime, the Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: That is because God is the Truth, and what they call upon besides Him is falsehood. God is the Most High, the Supreme One.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: That is because Allah! He is the Truth, because whatsoever they call upon beside Him is falsehood, and because He is the Exalted, the Grand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: That is because Allah is the Reality, and whatever they invoke besides Him is nullity, and because Allah is the All-exalted, the All-great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That is because Allah is the (only) Reality, and because whatever else they invoke besides Him is Falsehood; and because Allah,- He is the Most High, Most Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: That is because Allah, He is the Truth, and that which they invoke besides Him is Al-Batil (falsehood, Satan and all other false deities), and that Allah, He is the Most High, the Most Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: For Allah is the Truth, while that which they call upon, other than Him, is false. For that Allah is the Most High, the Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: That is because God is the Reality, and what they worship besides Him is falsehood, and because God is the Exalted, the Supreme.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: That is because Allah is the Truth, and that what they call upon other than Him is falsehood, and because Allah is the Most High, the Grand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [31:30] That, which is mentioned, is [so] because God, He is the Truth, the established [truth], and whatever they call on (read yad‘ūna; or tad‘ūna, ‘you call on’) whatever they worship, besides Him is, evanescent, falsehood, and because God is the High [Exalted], above His creation by virtue of [His] subjugation [of them], the Great, the Mighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (That (is so)) in order that you know and believe (because Allah, He is the True) worshipping Him is the Truth, (and that which they invoke) that which they worship (beside Him is the False) is falsehood, (and because Allah, He is the Sublime) more sublime than all things, (the Great) greater than all things. 467
